timeline.message:
Rename entityManager() to getEntityManager()

As discussed in https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/10541/files/c4127048865dad5b72c2c281bbdda60a50fcfb8c#r452203627

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                fun getEntityManager(): EntityManager = JpaOperations.getEntityManager()
          
          
            
                fun getEntityManager() = JpaOperations.getEntityManager()
          
      
    
    
  

I think this should be possible.
Same here https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/10611/files#diff-abda2266af87d72cd3c68169ac202d83R25
timeline.author: machi1990
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,7 +22,9 @@ interface PanacheEntityBase {
      *
      * @return the default [EntityManager]
      */
-    fun entityManager(): EntityManager = JpaOperations.getEntityManager()
+    @JsonbTransient
+    @JsonIgnore
+    fun getEntityManager(): EntityManager = JpaOperations.getEntityManager()

replies.bodyText: Intellij recommends using the type. If I do that it warns me with Declaration has type inferred from a platform call, which can lead to unchecked nullability issues. Specify type explicitly as nullable or non-nullable
replies.author: gastaldi
